alert.note: Alert for Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Obion County through 530 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cloverdale, or 11 miles southeast of Reelfoot Lake State Park, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Obion, Cloverdale, Sharps Ferry, Mason Hall, Elbridge, Wolverine and Glass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
